items.text_for_match: 'A culture to win' - how have Man City turned form around? After the disappointing end to August, September had the potential to turn into a crisis for Manchester City and manager Pep Guardiola, but they have turned their form around. After the disappointing end to August, September had the potential to turn into a crisis for Manchester City and manager Pep Guardiola, but they have turned their form around.

items.text_for_match: On the beach with Arteta and love of reading - Iraola in his own words Andoni Iraola sits down with Kelly Somers to discuss playing with Mikel Arteta and wanting to be remembered as a good person. items.ja: Barcelona's Gavi out for up to five months
items.en: Barcelona's Gavi out for up to five months
items.text_for_match: Barcelona's Gavi out for up to five months Spain midfielder Gavi is expected to miss four to five months after surgery on a knee injury suffered in training. Spain midfielder Gavi is expected to miss four to five months after surgery on a knee injury suffered in training.

items.ja: Lamine Yamal - the eve of a new football era
items.en: Lamine Yamal - the eve of a new football era
items.text_for_match: Lamine Yamal - the eve of a new football era Barcelona teenager Lamine Yamal missed out on becoming the youngest Ballon d'Or winner, but he is destined to create a new footballing era, writes Guillem Balague. Barcelona teenager Lamine Yamal missed out on becoming the youngest Ballon d'Or winner, but he is destined to create a new footballing era, writes Guillem Balague.

items.ja: FK Arsenal Tivat's Europe ban cut to seven years
items.en: FK Arsenal Tivat's Europe ban cut to seven years
items.text_for_match: FK Arsenal Tivat's Europe ban cut to seven years FK Arsenal Tivat's ban from European competition is reduced to seven years while goalkeeper Dusan Puletic is free to play again after winning his appeal.
